mapper.select: SELECT a.lookupid_fk as id FROM videotypelkp a WHERE videoid_fk=#{videoid} ORDER BY a.id DESC
SELECT a.* FROM lookupsocialnetworks a WHERE a.id=#{id} ORDER BY a.id DESC
SELECT a.* FROM lookuprating a WHERE a.id=#{id} ORDER BY a.id DESC
SELECT a.lookupid_fk as id FROM videotypelkp a WHERE videoid_fk=#{videoid_fk} ORDER BY a.id DESC
SELECT * FROM lookupvideotype a ORDER BY a.id DESC
SELECT * FROM lookupvideoshootingtype a ORDER BY a.id DESC
